title: Undergraduate Admissions Deadlines
content: Fall Term: Early Action due Nov 1; Regular Decision due Jan 15. Spring Term: Rolling admissions closes Oct 15. Applications require transcripts, test-optional ACT/SAT, personal statement, and one recommendation.

title: Scholarships & Financial Aid Overview
content: Merit scholarships are automatically considered with application; need-based aid requires FAFSA and institutional profile by Feb 1. Renewal requires maintaining a 3.0 GPA and full-time enrollment.

title: Academic Calendar Highlights
content: Fall semester runs late Aug–Dec; Spring runs Jan–May. Midterms in Oct and Mar. Final exam weeks are Dec and May. Official holidays: Labor Day, Thanksgiving, Winter Break, Spring Break.

title: Faculty Research Support
content: Seed grants up to $25,000 available each Fall; IRB required for human-subjects research. Grant development workshops held monthly; internal deadlines are two weeks before sponsor due dates.

title: Staff HR Policies (Leave & Benefits)
content: Full-time staff accrue 1.25 days PTO per month. Health, dental, and vision become active after 30 days. Remote work up to 2 days/week with supervisor approval.

title: Campus Tours & Visitor Info
content: Campus tours run Mon–Fri at 10am and 2pm; Saturday at 11am. Register online at /visit. Visitor parking available in Garage A; validation at Welcome Center.
